skill_cards.title: Photography
skill_cards.desc: I love sharing my photos with the world. In addition to my photos from around the world, you can also see photos from weddings, engagements and other events I have photographed.

skill_cards.title: Development
skill_cards.desc: Over the years, I have learned (and taught myself) lots about programming. Take a look at some of the development projects I'm involved in, and more information about the languages I'm familiar with.

skill_cards.title: Design
skill_cards.desc: My design experience doesn't just extend to web design, but also to physical products such as t-shirts and flyers.
